version_description:
Notifications filter. Now you can choose which notifications you want to get from us, and which you don't. Choose inspirational travel ideas or deals and offers. Or both. Or none!

Please keep sending us feedback. Our app is made by travelers for travelers like you and your comments help us make it better.

We’ve created some new features for you using the enhanced functionality of iOS 11.

- Login to Skyscanner without the hassle. Access your saved username and password simply from the QuickType bar on the keyboard.

- Compare your favorite flights by dragging them to the bottom of the screen, one by one or all together.

- Notifications filter. Now you can choose which notifications you want to get from us, and which you don’t. Choose inspirational travel ideas or deals and offers. Or both. Or none!

Please keep sending us your feedback. Our app is made by travelers for travelers like you and your comments help us make it better.

Optimized for iOS 11.
Please keep sending us your feedback. Our app is made by travelers for travelers like you and your comments help us make it better.

No big fixes in our latest update, just a few small bug fixes.

Rest assured, we are constantly improving our app to make it even better for travelers like you.

Thanks for all your great feedback - please keep it coming!

In this version:
- we've fixed an issue with Spotlight search to correctly show origins and destinations from your search history.
- a handoff bug was also fixed, so continuing your session on Mac is once again possible.
- there was a missing link issue when sharing hotel details via email. Now fixed.
Thanks for all your great feedback - please keep it coming!

- a handoff bug was also fixed, so continuing your session on Mac is once again possible.
- there was a missing link issue when sharing hotel details via email. Now fixed.
Thanks for all your great feedback - please keep it coming!

Thanks for all your great feedback - please keep it coming!

In this version:
- Bugs may be an occupational hazard for travelers but we don't like them around our app so we've squished lots more.
- Other than that, nothing much to report, although the fire alarm went off unexpectedly in the office yesterday!
- We're loving your feedback so please keep it coming.

- We're loving your feedback so please keep it coming.

In this version:
- Check out a bit of performance optimization and even fewer bugs.
- That said it’s been quiet. Too quiet. Virtually the whole team is out on the back porch, relaxing. (Or are we working on something big and new?)
- In other news, the feedback has been tremendous. Our new intern stayed up till past midnight on Thursday reading it all. Send more!

In this version:
- We've tweaked signing up to make it faster
- No more big news; we tidied up some code and tried out a new pizza place. Where did the week go?
- We know you're busy, but please keep your feedback coming - it brightens up our day.

What's New

This is a bit awkward, but we were so eager to tell you about our new Trips feature last version, we plain forgot to share the good news about our new Hotels screens.

So at the risk of telling you something you already know… ta-da! Check out our shiny new section. A new look, new content, ratings, reviews and comments from happy travelers. Plus TrustYou badges… we are so excited. See? Old news can be good news.

Next month we’ll tell you about the bugs we eradicated this month.

Meanwhile, if you see anything you like, don’t be shy, tweet @Skyscanner. Something you hate? Keep it to yourself (wink).

What’s New

We’ve spruced up our Trips feature. Now you can keep all your flights and other travel details in one place. And manually add in any upcoming flights. Not only that but wherever you’re from, you’ll find we speak your lingo.

Still in Trips: booked your flight but nowhere to rest your weary head? No worries, you can now search for a hotel right here.

Also new, when browsing destinations, you will now see top things to do, top restaurants, top hotels and top notch reviews from other users. Top tip.

Meanwhile, in Hotels, filtering images is now a thing. So instead of looking at zillions of pics all at once, you can choose to see pictures by category. Simples.

See anything you like? Don’t be shy, tweet @Skyscanner. Something you hate? Keep it to yourself (wink).

In this version:
- Some general debugging and tidying up. Not that exciting, but we're always working on creating a better experience for you.
- Got any feedback? Let us know, we love it!

Hey, thanks so much for adding loads of great reviews of the exciting trips you’ve done. We love getting them! And this feature is really helping other travelers plan their big adventures and make them as awesome as possible.

We spotted a few bugs in this part of our app, so we’ve fixed them. You should now find it easier to tell us how you feel, upload photos and navigate your way around the reviews area. Please keep sharing your views!

Also, all of our travelers across the globe can now use our improved Trips feature – storing all your journey details in one place. We’ve finished creating local versions in 34 languages, so our friends all over the world can enjoy it too.

Anything about our app you love? Or don’t love so much? Send us a tweet :)

Finding the right hotel is now much easier. And quicker too. Hotel options load 3 times faster and our cool redesign lets you compare more hotels per page. We've also improved our filters, making it easier to find exactly what you're looking for. Check it out then check in!

Finding the right hotel is now much easier. And quicker too. Hotel options load 3 times faster and our cool redesign lets you compare more hotels per page. We've also improved our filters, making it easier to find exactly what you're looking for. Check it out then check in!

You can now stay super organized by being able to move booked flights from one trip to another in the Trips tab. This gives you the freedom to move things around without losing any saved details. Just look for the 3 dots.

Tell us how you feel about our app on Twitter as we love to hear your views!

Finding the right hotel is now much easier. And quicker too. Hotel options load 3 times faster and our cool redesign lets you compare more hotels per page. We've also improved our filters, making it easier to find exactly what you're looking for. Check it out then check in!

Keep tabs on your bookings with our new status updates shown in Trips. When you book a flight or hotel using the pink button, you can see what stage your booking is at – in progress, confirmed, canceled or if something has gone wrong. And we'll update the status whenever things change.

Remember to tweet us with any feedback on our app so we can keep making it better!

So we've got good news and bad news.

We've fixed a bug that was causing the wrong dates to show on some upcoming flights saved in Trips – yay!
But to do this, we've had to remove flights from Trips completely for some of you who weren't logged into our app at the time of booking. We're sorry. Just enter the details again if you want them to show up.

If you were logged in when you booked, then we can still show you the flight details we have stored. Just double-check everything is correct and get in touch if there are any problems.

If you’re a VoiceOver user, this release makes it easier for you to book flights with the flight search and calendar. You’ll also be able to navigate around the app faster, as we’ve added helpful labels and headings. Please leave feedback – we’re always looking to improve the app’s accessibility.

You’ll notice that our app has a new look.
Our new logo and color scheme reflect how we want to have a positive impact on the world of travel: with optimism, sustainability and creativity.
We’ve also added new features: saving flights to your Trips, Sign in with Apple and Siri Event Suggestions – so a great travel experience starts before your journey does.

We’ve also added new features: saving flights to your Trips, Sign in with Apple and Siri Event Suggestions – so a great travel experience starts before your journey does.

Notice our new and improved look.
The updated design and feel shows how we care about travel through: optimism, imagination and sustainability.
We added new features, such as: flight savings, easy sign in with Apple and Siri event suggestions. Enjoy your travel experience before you even leave!

Black Friday and Cyber Monday are here!

The biggest travel deals have arrived. See and book the best deals from our 1,200 travel partners right in the app. Remember to keep checking back as we update deals throughout the weekend.

Our updated app makes it even easier to plan and book your whole trip — from flights and hotels to car rental.
So, whether it’s a family gathering, time with friends or a romantic getaway, you know that you have everything you need in one handy place.
Let’s take a trip together!

Price Prediction is now out and will help you get the best travel deal possible. Choose your flights and we’ll suggest whether to book now or later.
So, if we think you should hold out for a better deal, we’ll let you know.
Based on years of flight data, it’s just launched exclusively on our app.

Price Prediction is now out and will help you get the best travel deal possible. Choose your flights and we’ll suggest whether to book now or later.

In this version, we’ve also added Dark Mode, so you can keep an eye on deals any time (even when your battery is low or you want to do it secretly when everyone else is sleeping).

We've set ourselves the tough challenge to make travel more sustainable.
Now as you search for a flight, you will see the Greener Choice for that route — those flights that emit less CO2 than average.
It’s a simple way for you to make a difference and, with this new version, you will be able to filter search results to only show these greener options.
Pick a flight that is better for the planet for your next trip!

Bug fixes and performance improvements

New to 7.14.1 – Hotel cancellation. Now, more than ever, we’re striving to make planning travel as easy as possible. If your plans change, you can cancel hotel reservations right here on the app. Head to your booking in 'Trips', scroll to ‘Manage booking’ and hit ‘Cancel booking’.
Performance improvements to ensure you have the best experience possible when comparing travel deals.

Switch on our ‘free cancellation’ filter when you search for your dream hotel and book in total confidence. Lots of hotels let you cancel up to a few days before you check in so, if your plans do change, you won’t lose out later.

New in 7.27: Ready to get back out there? Discover which countries have low entry restrictions and no quarantine regulations when you arrive or return using our live map. Plus, don’t lose out if your flights or hotels need to be changed with flexible booking and free cancellation options.
